Web Development Team Lead / Product Manager

http://devbootcamp.com Aug 2014 - Jan 2015

Graduated from Dev Bootcamp, a 19-week intensive coding program during which he completed over 1,000 hours of programming. This program allowed him to master how to learn new languages and complexities, quickly. Topics and skills learned during this time include Ruby, Rails, Javascript, MEAN stack, TDD, Git, Postgresql, JQuery, and product development cycle and workflow.

During this time he:

Built a private social network platform for families where they can securely share photos, comments, polls, and other memories within their family.

Led a development team of four where they built a public API and a mobile application that make bar crawling more social, enjoyable, and memorable.

Co-Founder of Jossle

http://www.jossle.org/magazine/ April 2012 - December 2012

Jossle dedicates itself towards making college better for students everywhere by offering a variety of opportunities for earning extra income and an online magazine 100% powered by students. In this aim, Jossle is making it easier than ever before for companies to gain initial traction among college students.

Designed and led a viral social media campaign that reached over 10,000 unique views in one week.

Specialized in designing and producing marketing materials and presentations to the public.

Specialized in pricing different packages to clients, bookkeeping, and generating uniquely client-tailored business proposals.

Co-Founder & Advisor for Zabamba

http://zabamba.com May 2011 - Present

Currently acts as a board of advisor for web startup company that blends social media with consumerism. A Yelp for Kenya.

Oversaw and co-managed all aspects of the company's decision making in the departments such as operation, marketing and most specifically in finance.

Specialized in budget planning, accounting, financial goals and benchmarking, constructed financial statements, strategies and analyses.

Experienced dealing with programmers from the other side of the table, unexpected legal issues, as well as pivoting business models and value propositions to changing market trends and expectations.
